Select example:

```js
<Table>
    <thead>
        <tr>
            <th>Table header 1</th>
            <th>Table header 2</th>
        </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
        <tr>
            <td>Table data 1</td>
            <td>Table data 2</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>Table data 3</td>
            <td>Table data 4</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>Table data 5</td>
            <td>Table data 6</td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</Table>
```
